line_1: That is bestowed on the several Thrones
line_2: Of the worlds Monarchs, covets all their Crowns.

line_1: And Tyrants tremble on their blood-stain'd thrones.
line_2: Guilt with pale brow the mimic thunder owns,
All that in each Degree the name of Creature owns:

line_1: Thought silent Shades far happier than Thrones,
line_2: That Garlands sat much easier than Crowns.
